Text:
Just 1 suggestion... I presume as this says it will play on Xbox 360, PS3, some blu ray players and some upscaling DVD players that all you ups will be the same. If this is true could you please make them fit on a DVD (4.3Gig ish) as thjis one is too large at 4,7Gig & D/L discs are considerably more expensive than standard DVD's

Apart from that this is a brilliant film & the quality is spot on 
Thank You
